title: Ask HN: Why doesn't Elon sell Twitter to Google who can moderate automatically?
text:
Google probably has the best algorithm and AI people for moderating content automatically.

They could probably do an excellent job of moderating Twitter.

Ask HN: Term that describes architectures with minimal core
text: Hey HN, I'm looking for a term that best describes an architecture with a minimal central/core component. Serverless is close, but it typically describes an application running on cloud-hosted services. What is a good term to generalize serverless when the application can be either on-prem or on a third-party cloud?

Show HN: Social network based on multimedia polling
text:
Vote and browse polls created by other users.
Create your polls using text, image, audio, video, giphy, emoji, color, url embed choices.
Share or embed your polls or your profile anywhere.

Ask HN: For simple layouts, do I need CSS Flex or Grid?
text: For a simple one-dimensional blog layout (header -> navigation -> content -> footer), do I need to use these new CSS APIs? Will CSS's default behaviour continue to work in the future, or are all sites expected to use these new systems?
